attributes.additional_details: money MUST be made available for this breast cancer drug Kadcyla,it has extended lives of women /men,who otherwise would be dead ,you CANNOT PUT A PRICE ON LIFE ,ESPECIALLY LADIES WITH YOUNG CHILDREN AND GRANDCHILDREN,this drug gives them time ,to watch the kids growing up ,the longer a life can be extended with quality ,there is no reason to not approve this treatment.Roche the manufactures too,could help be ringing the price down ,but til then are British lives any less important than Norway etc ,who do provide this drug MAKE THIS AVAILABLE
